## Project Description

Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to conduct an expenditure needs assessment of remunerations rates for treaty boards within its jurisdiction. The selected contractor will provide options and recommendations for new remunerations rates to be used by the Implementation Sector of CIRNAC.

**Scope of Work**

* Conduct expenditure needs assessment of remunerations rates for treaty boards within CIRNAC's jurisdiction
* Provide options and recommendations for new remunerations rates
* Duration of contract: March 31, 2024
* Level of effort estimated: 52 days
